The realistic portrayal of legal battles and the evolving dynamics between characters create a thought-provoking narrative.

Another recommendation would be 'Better Call Saul'. Serving as a prequel to the acclaimed show 'Breaking Bad', it critically examines the transformation of Jimmy McGill into the morally flexible lawyer Saul Goodman. The show combines personal development with legal storylines and features grounded characters whose struggles and decisions have palpable consequences, offering viewers a captivating blend of crime and legal drama.
